<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/teams/{team_id}/list_projects"} context={"endpoint"} />

チームのすべてのプロジェクトを一覧表示します。


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"team_id","in":"path","description":"チーム ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"TeamId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"ボディ"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["id","name","slug","teamId","createTime"],"properties":{"createTime":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"ミリ秒単位のタイムスタンプ。"},"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"ProjectId"},"name":{"description":"スペースや句読点を含む完全なプロジェクト名。","type":"string","title":"ProjectName"},"slug":{"description":"Convex ダッシュボードの URL で使用される、名前の短縮版。","type":"string","title":"ProjectSlug"},"teamId":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"TeamId"}},"title":"PlatformProjectDetails"}}}}}}}
>
